original_text: Hezekiah was happy to meet the officers who came from the king of Babylon. Hezekiah showed them the places where he stored his valuable things. He showed them his silver and gold things, his spices and very valuable olive oil. He also showed them all his weapons. Hezekiah showed them all his valuable things. There was nothing in his palace or in his whole kingdom that he did not show to the king of Babylon's officers.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들의 말을 듣고 자기 보물고의 금은과 향품과 보배로운 기름과 그의 군기고와 창고의 모든 것을 다 사자들에게 보였는데 왕궁과 그의 나라 안에 있는 모든 것 중에서 히스기야가 그에게 보이지 아니한 것이 없더라

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah was happy to meet the officers
who came from the king of Babylon
where he stored his valuable things
He showed them his silver and gold things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 자신의 은과 금 보물들을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: his spices and very valuable olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 향료와 매우 귀중한 올리브유도 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: He also showed them all his weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그들에게 자신의 모든 무기들을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah showed them all his valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야는 그들에게 자신의 모든 귀중한 것들을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: There was nothing in his palace
that he did not show to the king of Babylon's officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바빌론 왕의 관원들에게 보여주지 않은 것은
